name: Baby Day-Delivery
description:
With the increase in demand in the baby market the old fashioned stork distribution system is just too slow. That's why we've hired a team of new drivers to help keep babies up (in the air) and delivery times low!

With our new spring-loaded baby launching system our drivers can deliver to our customer's hand without stepping a foot in the... sand(?)

Controller Support

(if this music doesn't get on your nerves I don't know what will)
